sentences.en: He looked as if he had glued the rakish beard on to his solemn face.
sentences.cn: 他看上去就象是把流云般的胡须贴在他庄重的脸上一样.

sentences.en: He was a serious young man, not rakish or loud - voiced like the others.
sentences.cn: 他是个规规矩矩的青年, 不象其它小伙子那样流里流气或大叫大嚷.

sentences.en: We were schooner - rigged and rakish , with a long and lissome hull ( John Masefield )
sentences.cn: 我们的船挂有大帆,流线形, 船身长,形态优美 ( 约翰梅斯菲尔德 )

sentences.en: Wild flowers standed side by side, making soft lake rakish.
sentences.cn: 湖边一排排的野花, 使这柔软的湖水又生了几分俏皮.

words.tran_cn: 潇洒的；放荡的；轻快的；俏皮的

trans.tran_cn: 纵情酒色的，放荡的，潇洒的，不拘俗套的
trans.tran_en: if a man looks rakish, or wears rakish clothes, he dresses nicely and looks confident and relaxed
